name: Graveyard Shift (itch) (ThePixelatedRabbit)
description:
Small arcade game made for practice  and different pixel art test with unity

Still not completely done with it, still needs audio and some graphic kinks worked out .Also i still need to polish the controls;

PlayerOne Controls 

Q- Interact,  E-Attack, WASD-Move

PlayerTwo Controls

R Shift- Interact,  R CTRL - Attack, R Shift + R CTRL - Switch Weapon, Arrows - Move  

I'll make a splash screen for the controls after i get some sleep.
